title: Welcome!
text:
Welcome to my website! Here you’ll find information about my education, research experience, professional experience, and leadership and service experience.
Enjoy some of my pictures from the last few years at Duke and Duke Kunshan Universtity!





Wandering through nature’s embrace in Suzhou, China







Stepping into the light of knowledge at Duke University









Poster Presentation for my Bass Connections Project at Duke University









My Research Team during Summer 2023 at Duke Kunshan Campus

title: Education
text:
Duke Kunshan University (DKU) / Duke University (Duke) Dual Degree
Aug 2021 - Aug 2025

B.S. in Data Science (by DKU) in Kunshan, China
B.S. in Interdisciplinary Studies (Subplan: Data Science) (by Duke) in Durham, NC, USA

§ Relevant Courses: Statistical Machine Learning, Computer Architecture, Advanced Data Visualization
Aug - Dec 2022

IES Abroad Barcelona, Spain

§ Relevant Courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Art and Design

Honors

Dean’s List with Distinction: Fall 2021
Dean’s List: Fall 2022



Skills
Python, Java, C (programming language), R, Excel, Git, Gitlab, TensorFlow, PyTorch, QGIS/ArcGIS, React, MS Office


Languages
English (fluent), Arabic (fluent), French (fluent), Chinese Mandarin (Elementary), Spanish (Elementary)


Class Projects

Music Recommendation System using Clustering Algorithms
This project is the final project of the course Elements of Machine Learning that I took at Duke Kunshan University. Please open this link for the report and code of project.


Report on Federated Learning
I wrote a report on Federated Learning, exploring the different aggregation algorithms as part of the course project for the Mathematics for Machine Learning course at Duke University.


Advanced Data Vizualization
Please take a look at our data visualization project, where we visualized the growing concern of water scarcity around the world.

title: Research
text:
Quantifying Wetland Carbon Emissions in the Southeastern United States

A Duke Bass Connections Team


Aug 2023 - May 2024

Implemented state of the art artificial neural networks for predicting regional-scale long-term CO2 flux data product for southeastern U.S. wetlands using TensorFlow and automatically tuned them with KerasTuner.
Processed historical and future spatially explicit data on climate and hydrology.
Generated monthly fine-gridded data products depicting both historical and future CO2 fluxes from wetlands in the Southeastern US.

https://bassconnections.duke.edu/project-teams/quantifying-wetland-carbon-emissions-southeastern-united-states-2023-2024



Poster





DKU Edge Intelligence Lab

Machine Leanring Summer Research Scholar


May - Aug 2023

Implemented sleep efficiency machine learning algorithms for FedCampus app, a health-related privacy-preserving application for the Duke Kunshan University campus. The data source is users’ edge devices such as their smartwatches and mobile phones.
Trained the model in a federated learning setting to enhance privacy and implemented it using automated hyper-parameter tuning and timeseries forecasting techniques for accurate predictions.


Key Technologies:
Tensorflow, PyTorch, Times Series Forecasting, Keras Tuner


Project Repo:
https://github.com/slaicha/fedCampus


Project Report
https://docs.google.com/document/d/14H0UPGZn32G3ihNV9H3IM5oeapewiNdy6prT77HLrGA/edit?usp=sharing




DKU Sustainability Report

Sep 2022 - Nov 2023

Contibuted to writing the first DKU Water Sustainability Report by interviewing DKU Campus Operations about water sustainability measures on campus, analyzing water consumption data, and researching relevant indicators of water sustainability




Enery Transition During Energy Crisis: Cape Town’s Experience

May - July 2024
https://bigdata.duke.edu/projects/energy-transition-during-energy-crisis-cape-towns-experience/

title: Experience
text:
Website Developer and Hackathon Organizer

HackDKU – DKU Computer Science Club

Aug 2023 - Mar 2024

Facilitated the organization of HackDuke Online at DKU by inviting mentors and preparing onsite venues
Contributed to building HackDKU website, the inaugural annual hackathon event on Duke Kunshan University’s campus. which attracted more than 100 participants from different universities in China





Peer Mentor

DKU Office of Undergraduate Advising

July 2022 - July 2023

Served as an advisor to 10 first year students and provided information to them about academics, campus resources, DKU community experience, etc.
Hosted and assisted in the Advising office’s events such as mentees-mentors mixer event, major fair, and the scavenger hunt.
Was awarded outstanding mentee certificate of the year.





Teaching Assistant and Orientation Leader

Aug-Oct 2022

Supported the teaching of DKU101, an introductory course to first year students about DKU and campus resources.
Tracked the attendance of 350 students using Excel (two classes every week for seven weeks) and reported back to instructors.
Assisted in and organized activities for first-year students during their orientation week.




Remote Corporate Venture Capital & Business Analytics Internship

HP Tech Ventures & Paragon One

Jun - Aug 2022

Researched startup metrics, industry data, team, and business models.
Determined product differentiation and strategy across different startups.
Recommended attractive startups to HP officials for further investment due diligence.





Internship @ Huochai

Feb - Apr 2022

Brainstormed and developed detailed implementation plans of online charity events for Huochai Box to engage teachers in rural areas, through group discussions, information comparison, and actual situation debugging.




Career Student Ambassador

DKU Career Services Office

Jan-May 2022

Served as a bridge between the Career Service office and 90 DKU first-year students by presenting to them the office’s services and reporting their questions and concerns.
Helped students with resumes and their career development.

title: Leadership & Service
text:
Volunteer

Duke Femmes+ Club
Facilitated the capstone event of FEMMES+, is a free one-day outreach program introducing students from Durham (4th through 6th grade) to math, science and engineering.



Volunteer teacher

DKU Volunteer Association

May 2023 & Nov 2023

Taught 7-11 years old Chinese children English classes and prepared class materials and activities for them.





DKU Student Ambassador

Office of International Enrollment Management at DKU

Dec 2022 - Mar 2024

Served as a facilitator on Discord and helped prospective students explore DKU facilities and services.
